title: Celestial Chronicles
description: CelestialChronicles crafts a personalized cosmic adventure, revealing a NASA image from your birth day. Uncover unique birthdate facts in this exclusive celestial experience

title: Password Generator
description: Password generator using prompts. Users are prompted to choose a password between 8 and 128 characters

title: Readme-Generator
description: Command-line application that dynamically generates a professional README.md file from a user's input using Node.js
